Class DynamicPlayFile

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DynamicPlayFile
extends java.lang.Object
    The dynamic play file defines dynamic areas and how to play them on the screen.

    ONBON

    • Method Detail

      • createArea

        public DynamicArea createArea(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height)
        Create a new dynamic area in the file. The area id will be generated based on count of areas.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the area.
        y - The y coordinate of the area.
        width - The width of the area.
        height - The height of the area.
        Returns:
        A new dynamic area added in the file.

      • createArea

        public DynamicArea createArea(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     int areaId)
        Create a new dynamic area in the file.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the area.
        y - The y coordinate of the area.
        width - The width of the area.
        height - The height of the area.
        areaId - The area id.
        Returns:
        A new dynamic area added in the file.

      • generate

        public DynamicPlan generate()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates a dynamic plan.
        Returns:
        The dynamic plan.
        Throws:
        Y2Exception - Failed to generate a dynamic plan.
        java.lang.Exception
